DOC.brief_summary: Introduction . Tension-type headache highly prevalent disorder significant socio-economic impact , affect psychological aspect . This study aim assess aspect pertain anxiety , depression , headache frequency pain intensity . Subjects method . A clinical trial conduct 84 participant suffer tension-type headache , divide 4 group , mean age 39.76 year ( SD 11.38 ) . The first group receive suboccipital soft tissue treatment ( ST ) ; second group treat articulatory technique ( AT ) ; third group apply combination technique ( ST AT ) forth group serve control group . Treatment session administer four week , post-treatment assessment , follow-up one month . The investigator conduct Repeated measure Analysis Covariance ( RM-MANCOVA ) evaluate effect treatment within-subject condition interaction report depression , anxiety , headache pain frequency intensity .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Therapy Tension Headache With Psychological Disorders
DOC.criteria: Patients participate study diagnose primary healthcare center frequent episodic tensiontype headache ( ETTH ) chronic tensiontype headache ( CTTH ) describe International Headache Society ( IHS ) . Participants present pericranial tenderness evolve period great six month pharmacologically stable . Exclusion criterion cover patient secondary headache suffer photophobia phonophobia , nausea vomiting , case headache aggravate head movement , musculoskeletal disorder , previous neck trauma , vertigo , dizziness , arterial hypertension , arthritis advance degenerative osteoarthritis , patient heart device , excessive emotional tension , neurological disorder , radiological alteration , pregnancy positive vertebral artery test .
